response.original_title: Lux e Trance / La puerta de Saturno
response.overview: Experimental photography is the hidden language of the universe and the photographer is the pillar that receives the vibrations of cosmic feeling: alchemical techniques and the mystery of forms within perpetual existence; he warns the spells for the creation that illuminates those who dare to explore with other eyes and other ears thus sustaining the march towards the cosmic eternity of the image.
response.title: Lux e Trance / La puerta de Saturno
